snippet: The teenagers have been charged in the sexual assaults of four students in four separate attacks at the high school, the Middlesex County prosecutor said.
abstract: Seventh New Jersey teenager surrenders to police in connection with hazing and sexual assaults among high school football players in Sayreville; six other teenagers have been taken into custody.
lead_paragraph: The teenagers have been charged in the sexual assaults of four students in four separate attacks at the high school, the Middlesex County prosecutor said.

headline.main: 7th Sayreville Football Player Surrenders in a New Jersey Hazing Case
headline.print_headline: Seventh New Jersey Teenager Is in Custody in a Hazing Case

keywords.value: Sayreville War Memorial High School (Sayreville, NJ)
